com.raystech.proj0.ctl

Class UserCtl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raystech.proj0.ctl.BaseCtl
      • com.raystech.proj0.ctl.UserCtl

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/ctl/User")
public class UserCtl
extends BaseCtl
    Contains navigation logics for User and User List usecases.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Singleton
